long_description: Need a waterproof jacket for your trip to London or Seattle? The Marmot Southhampton Jacket fills the bill. Urban lines and a detachable hood keep you styling in comfort. Marmot MemBrain(R) polyester/cotton fabric is waterproof, windproof and breathable. 100% seam taped to seal out weather. Water-resistant zippers on single chest pocket; flapped pockets have snap closure; hand pockets also have side entry. Internal zippered media pocket and internal welt pocket stow your valuables. Marmot Southhampton Jacket features adjustable snap cuffs and a drawcord hem that keep warmth in, weather out.
short_description: Need a waterproof jacket for your trip to London or Seattle? The Marmot Southhampton Jacket fills the bill. Urban lines and a detachable hood keep you styling in comfort.
